summary: This mod replaces the clothes of those children who are related to the Dark Brotherhood questline.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new clothes for both Aventus Aretino and Babette from the Dark Brotherhood questline.

Because Aventus was in his home for so long, handling human flesh and performing the black sacrament, I thought it would be more realistic if I added bloodstains and dirt to his clothing. As for Babette, she now has an outfit that suits her, as she IS in the Dark Brotherhood and thus requires its uniform.
author: Maladrum
